Articles.Content:
Just that, what Forum theme do you use?

I use KSP2 Dark Red Theme, and I was wondering if i was the only person who uses it.
I use KSP Light because all the other themes look a bit off at times.
I use KSP2 Dark Red because I like dark mode (it saves my eyes) and this KSP2 logo and the red are a lot slicker-looking in my opinion.

I use KSP Dark. I like the standard look of the forums, but dark mode is so much better on my eyes. Also, doesn't a red link just look wrong?

Edited January 15 by Kerbalsaurus

Default light.  Anything in dark mode is utterly unreadable and it's becoming increasingly frustrating that the whole of the internet is defaulting to that with no light mode option for many things (looking at you, Steam).
Dark and I feel exactly the same as @Geonovast feels about forced dark mode, only about default light mode (I'm looking at you, 99% of the internet).
I just use the default light mode. Sometimes when I'm browsing in the late evening or at night I temporarily switch to the ksp dark mode.
I use default light. It's the only one that looks right IMO.
